features.description: Loan of up to Rs. 40 Lakh

featuresAndBenefits.title: Features and Benefits of our Personal Loan
featuresAndBenefits.description: A personal loan is an unsecured loan that is not backed by collateral or security. This makes it a flexible financing option, as there are no limitations on its use.

benefits.title: Debt consolidation
benefits.description: Combining multiple debts into a single loan with a lower interest rate to save money on interest payments and make it easier to manage debts.

benefits.title: Home renovation
benefits.description: Using a personal loan to fund home renovation projects can increase the value of your home and improve your living conditions.

benefits.title: Medical expenses
benefits.description: If you have unexpected medical expenses, such as emergency surgery or hospitalization, a personal loan can help cover the costs.

benefits.title: Emergency expenses
benefits.description: A personal loan can help cover unexpected expenses like medical emergencies or car repairs to avoid financial hardship.

homeLoanFeaturesAndBenefits.title: Features and Benefits of our Home Loan
homeLoanFeaturesAndBenefits.description: A vast array of institutions offer you the best home loan rates at the most competitive rates and affordable EMIs.

benefits.title: Home Construction Loan
benefits.description: If you have a plot of land and lack financial support to construct a home on that piece of property, you may choose a house construction loan. Such borrowing is mainly made to construct or repair a major part of your home.

benefits.title: Home Extension Loan
benefits.description: Should you already own a home, and feel the need to extend the building, add an annexe, or build another floor, etc., Home Extension Loan is your go-to option that finances such needs.

benefits.title: Home Improvement Loan
benefits.description: All of us wish to improve and upgrade our homes for a better life. From your old-age furniture, fixtures to faulty lightning systems, Home Improvement Loan funds all your plans.

benefits.title: NRI Home Loan
benefits.description: If you are a patriot, a Non-Resident Indian, and wish to own residential property in India, NRI Home Loan is your answer. Though the formalities for application may be a little different.

features.description: Loans value from Rs.10 Lakh to Rs. 5 Crore
Loans against commercial, residential or industrial property
Loan for your business as well as personal needs

loanAgainstProprtiesFeaturesAndBenefits.title: Features and Benefits of our Loan Against Property

benefits.title: Secured Loan
benefits.description: The loan is secured against the value of your property. The property acts as collateral, reducing the risk for the lender. This generally leads to lower interest rates compared to unsecured loans.

benefits.title: Loan Amount
benefits.description: The loan amount is determined based on the value of the property you pledge. Generally, you can get a higher loan amount compared to personal loans or other unsecured loans.

benefits.title: Flexible Tenure
benefits.description: The tenure (repayment period) for a Loan Against Property is usually longer compared to other types of loans, often ranging from 5 to 20 years. This allows for lower monthly installments.

benefits.title: Multipurpose
benefits.description: The loan amount can be used for a wide range of purposes, giving you the flexibility to address various financial needs without any restrictions.

benefits.title: Improves Credit Scores
benefits.description: Successfully repaying a Loan Against Property can positively impact your credit score, as it demonstrates responsible borrowing behavior.

educationLoanFeaturesAndBenefits.title: Features and Benefits of our Education Loan

benefits.title: Moratorium Period
benefits.description: Repayment typically starts after the completion of the course, providing students time to secure employment.

benefits.title: Co-borrower Option
benefits.description: Parents or guardians can be co-borrowers to enhance eligibility.

benefits.title: Tax Benefits
benefits.description: Repayment interest might be eligible for tax deductions under Section 80E of the Income Tax Act.

benefits.title: Multiple Courses and Institutions
benefits.description: Loans are available for various courses, from school education to higher studies, and for institutions in India and abroad.

benefits.title: Collateral and Non-Collateral Loans
benefits.description: Depending on the loan amount, some may require collateral, while smaller loans might not need any security.

goldLoanFeatures.title: Features and Benefits of our Gold Loan

features.description: Apply with PAN or Aadhaar Card

goldLoanFeaturesAndBenefits.title: Features and Benefits of our Gold Loan

benefits.title: Secured Loan
benefits.description: Backed by gold collateral.

benefits.title: Quick Processing
benefits.description: Fast approval and disbursement.

benefits.title: Flexible Loan Amount
benefits.description: Based on pledged gold value.

benefits.title: Instant Liquidity
benefits.description: Access funds quickly without selling gold.

benefits.title: Lower Interest Rates
benefits.description: Secured nature leads to competitive rates.

benefits.title: Versatile Use
benefits.description: No restrictions on how loan funds are used.
